title: The Intelligence - “The Trump campaign seems to be pulling out all the stops”—an election heads for the courts
summary:
Also on the daily podcast: the pandemic’s mixed effects on birth rates and a suite alternative to working from home“The Trump campaign seems to be pulling out all the stops”—an election heads for the courtsAS PRESIDENT DONALD TRUMP’S re-election path slims, his pledges to fight the results in court are multiplying.
We look at the cases that may eventually decide the election.
Global crises tend to affect birth rates, and covid-19 is no different—but the effects are not evenly spread.
And a suite alternative for business types tired of working from home.
Runtime: 20minListen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneInFor full access to print, digital and audio editions of The Economist, subscribe here www.economist.com/intelligenceoffer
paragraphs: Also on the daily podcast: the pandemic’s mixed effects on birth rates and a suite alternative to working from home
“The Trump campaign seems to be pulling out all the stops”—an election heads for the courts

AS PRESIDENT DONALD TRUMP’S re-election path slims, his pledges to fight the results in court are multiplying. We look at the cases that may eventually decide the election. Global crises tend to affect birth rates, and covid-19 is no different—but the effects are not evenly spread. And a suite alternative for business types tired of working from home. Runtime: 20min
Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneIn
